workflow.display-name: Remove a DNS A record from Infoblox
workflow.description: Deletes the host record (aka A record), as specified by its Reference ID, from Inboblox

param.name: restHost
param.description: The Infoblox REST host that should take the request.

param.name: hostReferenceId
param.description: Reference ID of the host record to delete

attrib.name: requestType
attrib.description: The type of the request (GET, SET, POST, etc).

attrib.name: requestUrl
attrib.description: The URL that should be appended to the host base URL in order to make the request.

attrib.name: requestContent
attrib.description: Content that is submitted as part of the request. Will be updated to include hostname and IP address.

attrib.name: requestContentType
attrib.description: Optional. If requestContent is specified, then specify its Type (ex: text/html).

attrib.name: logUrl
attrib.description: Optional debug logging. Use null/false if there is a password or secret key in the URL.

attrib.name: logContent
attrib.description: Optional debug logging. Use null/false if there is a password or secret key in the Content.

attrib.name: logResults
attrib.description: Optional debug logging. Use null/false if there is a password or secret key in the Results.

attrib.name: requestResponse
attrib.description: Properties object with the results of the REST request.

workflow-item.description:
Makes a quick call to a REST host, without the need to have a REST Operation defined.
Adds debug logging and success validation to VMware's "Invoke a REST host" workflow. Keeps the same Output type as that workflow, to make it easier to swap-out that workflow with this one. Logging the Request URL, Request Content, and Results are all optional, in case they contain a password or secret key.
